item.title: PFL Lyon Full Card Preview – Date, Time And How To Watch
item.description: PFL Lyon Dec 13 features Nemkov vs Ferreira for heavyweight title and Cyborg vs Collins. Watch at 11am ET on ESPN Unlimited.

item.title: The Complexity of Civet Coffee Goes Well Beyond Your Palate
item.description: The increased demand for civet coffee has fueled civet poaching and smuggling. If we can recreate similar fermentation in a bioreactor then we can end...

item.title: Arcadia’s Massive SDF-1 Macross Toy Is Now Better Than Ever
item.description: One of the most iconic designs in all of mecha anime now has a huge toy to do it justice. In short, the SDF-1 Macross has never looked so good.

item.title: Classic Mecha Game ‘Virtual On’ Celebrates Its 30th Anniversary
item.description: Today marks the 30th anniversary of the original 'Cyber Troopers Virtual On', which was to be released in Japanese arcades and later worldwide.

item.title: ‘NYT Mini Crossword’ Clues And Answers For Thursday, November 27
